lankawa muhuna di sitinne dhanapathi rajyaya dhanapathi prajathanthrawadi widhikrama walata anuwa nisi lesa pawathwa gena ya nohaki wime prashnayakada?nathinam dhanapathi rajyaya namathi prashnayatada?wikruthi kramaweda walin ho rajapaksha palanaya kriyawe yodawamin sitinne sambhawya¬†dhanapathi panthiya balaye sitina witadida kriyawata nanwimata apeksha kala nawa libaral prathisanskarana samudayayi.kolambaa palpathwasin elawa damimbaa gana ada kathakarana ejapaya heta balaya atha path wu¬†kalhi ganu labana piyawara kawarakda?palpathwasinge jiwana thathwaya ihala nanwima ilakka kota gath owun matha thabu prathipaththiyakda?weladapola balawegayanta idam kollakamata ida di ‚Äúaarthika wardhana wegaya‚Äù ihala nanwana aakaraye prathipaththiyakda?kolambaadi ho wewa migamu kalapuwedi ho wewa uthuru nagenahiradi ho wewa idam kollaye haraya ekaki.eya rajyayak lesa dhanapathi rajyaye swarupaya samaga badi¬†thibena prashnayaki.prashnaya lesa gatha yuththe ema prabhu kendriya rajyaya misa ema rajyaya kriyawe yedawena ‚Äúwidhikramaya‚Äù nowe.widhikramaya kawarak wuwath piditha janayata in athi wenasak natha.kolambaa idam ada rajapaksha rejimaya wadi komis pramanayakata hithawathun pirisakata wikunaddi ( me hithawathun athara china samagam wadipura sitiya haka) heta ‚Äúsambhawya dhaneshwaraya‚Äù ( lankawe dhanapathi panthiya yuropaye wage siriyas aakarayen sambhawyaya yayi mama hithanne naha.aduma tharamin indiyawe tharam wath) eyama samaharawita adu komis mudalakata wenath pirisakata ( ee pirisa athara wadipara yuropa samagam sitiya haka) badu dimata ida thibe.kolambain elawa damena dugiyage iranama me kawarak sidu wuwada wenas wanawada?me siduwenne ada maoowadi karalla barapathala lesa pathira yana madhya indiyawe siduwemin pawathina idam kollayamaya.
